name: Ticker Links
author: Polygon

sections.description:
This plugin provides the ability to easily link to current stock market information for any ticker symbol on Stock Market API provider Polygon.io.

To link to a stock within your content:

From the options menu, select “Edit as HTML”
Wrap any of your content in a span tag and add the attribute data-ticker-links=”TICKER”
Save and preview your content.

Example:

Cruise stocks have been up this week, showing an overall trend in the travel sector.
Companies such as Norwegian Cruise Lines and
Royal Caribbean Group have lead the rally.

Your previewed/published content will be enriched with a link for the user to see the current stock price, charts, and news for
the provided stock ticker such as Royal Caribbean Group.

You can find the available ticker symbols using Polygon’s Stock Ticker API
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins in the Admin menu
  2. Click on the button Add new
  3. Search for Ticker Links and click ‘Install Now’ or click on the upload link to upload ticker-links.zip
  4. Click on Activate plugin
sections.faq:
Which tickers are available?

You can use the Stock Ticker API to search for available symbols, or
scan through available stock tickers on the website.

What is Polygon.io

Polygon is a market data API platform that provide APIs for stocks (including OTC), options, forex, and crypto.
You can create a free account to get access to end-of-day price data and two years of historical data.

short_description: Enrich stock market content by providing links to current price, charts, and news from .
